channel.title: [Release] ExoticPK Source [Release]
channel.description:
Hello people, It' Glade here and I'm releasing this edited EasyRSC source ExoticPK. I will no longer run my server so have fun with the source! :D
http://uppit.com/v/QW53FTT4 - ExoticPK Source.
http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=757c8c9781ebf4dc1f8e0fff488e27e0e04e75f6e8ebb871 - ExoticPK Source.
[b][u]Futures[/u][/b]
- Druidic Ritual (Quest) You can start this quest by speaking with kaqemeex located in edge behind the general store
- chickens in edge
- moss giants in Edge forest
- greaters in the ::greaters teleport command
- max stat 125, max combat 156
- fountain in varrock square
- altar by the border of edge
- well in Edge changed to a fountain
- range supplise in edge general store
- iron, black, mith, addy, and rune armour and all 2hs sold in varrock general store
- 200x exp rate
- start out location in Edge with a sleeping bag and a iron 2h
- full working master fisher (gives out swordies)
- kbd teleport by talking to koftik (he is located behind edge bank)
- commands are
::fatigue
::greaters
:: say
:: stuck
::edge
::castle
::caltar
::valtar
:: pkbox
:: online
:: onlinelist
- custom pkbox
- new herbs cleanable (check the item id list in the source download look at the very bottom off the notepad)
Pic of chickens in edge [IMG]http://chickens - http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/7821/chickens.png[/img]
Edge general store [IMG]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/2003/edgeshop.png[/img]
Varrock general store [IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/7540/vshop.png[/img]
Druidic Ritual [IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/5003/questpic.png[/img]
Completed Druidic Ritual [IMG]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/3131/completedc.png[/img]
Greaters [IMG]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/3131/completedc.png[/img]
Account Info [IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/8030/controlpanele.png[/img]
KBD [IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/6596/kbdq.png[/img]
Heres a pic of the pkbox [IMG]http://img207.imageshack.us/img207/3296/pkbox.png[/img]
Thats about all folks.
Kind Regards, Glade.

item.title: [Release] ExoticPK Source [Release]
item.dc:creator: @suprkwlguy123 suprkwlguy123
item.description:
@suprkwlguy123 wrote:

[quote=“dear god, post:68, topic:277667”][quote author=!the_don link=topic=366574.msg2788962#msg2788962 date=1242619532]
On the internet, you’re all no namers, including myself.
[/quote]

To everyone arguing about “No namers,” You’re all no namers.People don’t come up to you in real life and tell you “Man that update you did on your server last night was so fucking awesome.” It’s retarded and childish to think that because you have internet rep that you matter.[/quote]Wrong, there’s a person on youtube called gross gore and he has had tones of people come up to him and say “Man I love your videos” in real life.

Read full topic

item.description:
@iTroll wrote:

[quote=“pklobbys, post:53, topic:277667”]Buildfile: build.xml

runclient:
[java] Session ID: -4918262152528880459 - Login Response:0
[java] Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsExcept
ion: 9
[java] at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawPlayerInfoMenu(mudclient.j
ava:1456)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawGameWindowsMenus(mudclient
.java:6332)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawGame(mudclient.java:2300)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.method4(mudclient.java:841)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindow.run(GameWindow.java:282)
[java] at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

im getting this error, when i compile no errors
and i play the client
after walking awhile 1 min
then game freezes, and this pops out from cmd[/quote]Try using the distrubuted client.

Read full topic
